remarks: Keep a hypothesis containing 2 class variables (for use with the weak deduction theorem ~ dedth ).  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2005.)
statement:
keephyp2v.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
keephyp2v.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , B , D ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
keephyp2v.3 $e |- ( C = if ( ph , A , C ) -> ( ta <-> et ) ) $.
keephyp2v.4 $e |- ( D = if ( ph , B , D ) -> ( et <-> th ) ) $.
keephyp2v.5 $e |- ps $.
keephyp2v.6 $e |- ta $.
keephyp2v $p |- th $.
